item.description:
Meetup at MetroRock Gym in Everett. 

NEW MEETING LOCATION: UPSTAIRS IN THE LOUNGE/WORKOUT AREA.

We'll meet up at 7:00 PM.

Toprope, sport leading, and bouldering available, including some tall walls up to 45 feet. If you'd like to lead climb, don't forget your to bring your rope :)

If arriving later, just come find us on the walls. Hopefully you can recognize me (see "Event Host" right) from my picture, and/or I'll try to remember to write a description of what I'm wearing on the white board near the bathrooms, so you can find us more easily.

If you've never climbed here before, you'll need to take & pass a belay test for rope climbing. Call the gym or see the website below for more info. Full-access Day Pass $18. Bouldering-Only Pass $15. Mondays are Women's Night: Women's Day Pass $10. More info and directions: http://www.metrorock.com/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: NEW MEETING LOCATION: UPSTAIRS IN THE LOUNGE/WORKOUT AREA.
item.why: I will be ready to climb between 6 & 6:15 PM, before it gets busy. I will go up to the Lounge/Workout area from 7 - 7:15 PM to meet people who prefer to show up at the regular MeetUp time.
item.name: MetroRock FRIDAY, showing up early OK
